categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Clanky" was the nickname of a clone trooper sergeant who served in Jedi General Etain Tur-Mukan's Improcco Company.
He fought side by side with the general during the Skirmish at Dinlo. He and his squad made it back alive. After the skirmish, Clanky gave Clone Commander Gett a summary of the battle.
Clanky had regular Phase I clone trooper armor with the traditional green markings of a Clone trooper sergeant. He fought with a DC-15S and also made use of electromagnetic pulse grenades.
